description: RIA-2168 Send hearing requirements adjustments submitted notification (Admin Officer)

notifications.subject: Immigration and Asylum appeal: list case
body: The Tribunal Caseworker has submitted the hearing requirements and additional adjustments.
Review the agreed hearing requirements and any additional adjustments in the Hearing tab, then list the case in Aria.
You should then list the case in the online service. Once you've done this, the Notice of Hearing will be sent to all parties.
